Title: Relates to requiring food service establishments to permit the use of reusable beverage and food containers provided by customers
Summary: Requires food service establishments to permit the use of reusable beverage and food containers provided by customers when requesting a beverage refill or requesting leftovers from a partially consumed meal to be packaged and post signs to inform customers that they are permitted to do so.
LawCode: Add ยง1352-f, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring food service establishments to permit the use of reusable beverage and food containers provided by customers
